channel.title: Recipes on GrantSeltzer
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on GrantSeltzer

item.description: <- recipes Miami rolls are a challah based onion pocket roll. They’re very soft, sweet, flavorful, and delicious. Pretty traditional to jewish bakeries in New York. I worked at a bakery all throughout high school and these were my favorite things there. When they closed down in 2020 I tried to get the recipe but the owner wouldn’t share it with me. Through 10+ iterations I have engineered a recipe that is exactly how I remember them.
